mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(num), 0) from item_order where order_no = #{orderNo} and deleted = false

select r.order_no, r.store_id, t.title as storeName, r.pay_type, r.state, r.pay_amount, r.refund_state, r.discount_amount, r.create_time, r.pay_time, r.remark, r.complete_time, r.close_time, r.nick_name, r.mobile, r.province_id, r.city_id, r.county_id, r.detail_address from `order` r left join item_store t on t.id = r.store_id where t.deleted = false and r.member_id = #{memberId} and r.order_no = #{orderNo}
select item_id, title, refund_state, delivery_state, num, refund_num, cover_url, sku_title, sale_price from item_order where order_no = #{orderNo} and deleted = false

select r.order_no, r.store_id, t.title as storeName, r.pay_type, r.state, r.pay_amount, r.refund_state, r.discount_amount, r.create_time, r.close_type, r.pay_time, r.remark, r.complete_time, r.close_time, r.nick_name, r.mobile, r.province_id, r.city_id, r.county_id, r.detail_address from `order` r left join item_store t on t.id = r.store_id where t.deleted = false and r.order_no = #{orderNo}
and r.merchant_id = #{merchantId}

select r.id, r.express_no, r.express_code, r.content, t.item_id, t.title, t.refund_state, t.delivery_state, t.num, t.refund_num, t.cover_url, t.sku_title, t.sale_price from item_express r left join item_order_express s on r.id = s.express_id left join item_order t on s.item_order_id = t.id where t.order_no = #{orderNo} and t.deleted = false

select t.order_no, t.store_id, t.depict, t.cover_url, t.sku_cover_url, t.sku_title, t.sale_price, t.line_price, t.purchase_notes, t.delivery_type, t.introduce, r.title as storeName, r.logo_url as storeLogoUrl from item_order t left join item_store r on t.store_id = r.id where t.id = #{orderId}
and t.member_id = #{memberId}
